channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee, LLC -- McAfee Enterprise Security Manager (ESM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee, LLC -- McAfee Enterprise Security Manager (ESM)

item.title: CVE-2019-3631|2024-08-04T19:12:09.675Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- mcafee%20enterprise%20security%20manager%20%28esm%29
item.description: Command Injection vulnerability in McAfee Enterprise Security Manager (ESM) prior to 11.2.0 and prior to 10.4.0 allows authenticated user to execute arbitrary code via specially crafted parameters.

item.title: CVE-2019-3629|2024-08-04T19:12:09.717Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- mcafee%20enterprise%20security%20manager%20%28esm%29
item.description: Application protection bypass vulnerability in McAfee Enterprise Security Manager (ESM) prior to 11.2.0 and prior to 10.4.0 allows unauthenticated user to impersonate system users via specially crafted parameters.

item.title: CVE-2019-3628|2024-08-04T19:12:09.699Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- mcafee%20enterprise%20security%20manager%20%28esm%29
item.description: Privilege escalation in McAfee Enterprise Security Manager (ESM) 11.x prior to 11.2.0 allows authenticated user to gain access to a core system component via incorrect access control.

item.title: CVE-2019-3630|2024-08-04T19:12:09.593Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- mcafee%20enterprise%20security%20manager%20%28esm%29
item.description: Command Injection vulnerability in McAfee Enterprise Security Manager (ESM) prior to 11.2.0 and prior to 10.4.0 allows authenticated user to execute arbitrary code via specially crafted parameters.

item.title: CVE-2019-3632|2024-08-04T19:12:09.602Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- mcafee%20enterprise%20security%20manager%20%28esm%29
item.description: Directory Traversal vulnerability in McAfee Enterprise Security Manager (ESM) prior to 11.2.0 and prior to 10.4.0 allows authenticated user to gain elevated privileges via specially crafted input.
